Posts.Content: Hi Jen I like you have just finished chemo. I had a mascetomy and was diagnosed with stage 3  Herceptin and Estrogen positive. I have had one Herceptin jab, whilst nothing like the side effects of chemo I do feel very achy, just wondered if you have had any side effects from the jab.. also are you starting Lethrozole, I am due to start after my Radiotherapy and wanted to know what to expect. Thanks
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Grade 3

Posts.Content: Hi Could you tell me how you found out whether your cancer was ‘curable’ or ‘treatable’.  I have recently finished radiotherapy, having had Chemo and a mascetomy. I was diagnosed last summer with Multifocal breast cancer, grade 3 HER2. My radiotherapy was also to my chest wall, Axilla and SCF. I suppose I just assumed this treatment was curing...seeing the post from sazzat I now wondering if I should be asking  Any advice would be great Thanks
Posts.Title: New here and supporting my sister with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Phew, thanks JoJo was just getting a bit anxious.  Thanks so much, good luck with your rads, I found that the easy bit
Posts.Title: New here and supporting my sister with breast cancer
